function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission risk through contact with surfaces in bathrooms and public restrooms","Impact":"Potential transmission of viruses and microorganisms","Mitigation":"Implement touchless technologies and self-cleaning mechanisms in bathrooms and public restrooms","Technologies":"Touchless technologies, self-cleaning technologies","People":"Residents, visitors, public restroom users","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Health risks associated with toxic antimicrobial additives in indoor finishing materials","Impact":"Toxicity to humans, potential health hazards","Mitigation":"Carefully select non-toxic antimicrobial additives for indoor finishing materials","Technologies":"Non-toxic antimicrobial additives, material testing","People":"Residents, construction professionals, building designers","Owner":"Construction companies, building designers"},{"Description":"Poor indoor air quality leading to potential spread of viruses","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and respiratory issues","Mitigation":"Ensure constant air ventilation and maintain proper temperature and humidity levels","Technologies":"Air ventilation systems, air quality monitors","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
